txt.en: The Wargs of Dol Guldur gain unusual strength from eating specially-prepared meat. You have been challenged to defeat the Wargs who have already consumed this vile feed, right down to the last morsel.
Challenge: Meat for the Warg-pens Completed
Clear the pens of all meat-slabs

The slavering Wargs reside in the Warg-pens of Dol Guldur.\n\nYou must goad the Wargs to consume all the slabs of vile meat located throughout the encounter, then attempt to best them in their strengthened state.
